Number of employees to trigger requirement to provide PSL
comments: ( Caution: N.Y. Lab. Law Sec. 196-b(1) states (a)For employers with four or fewer employees in any calendar year and that has a net income of greater than one million dollars in the previous tax year shall provide each employee with up to forty hours of paid sick leave pursuant to this section; (b) For employers with between five and ninety-nine employees in any calendar year each employee shall be provided with up to forty hours of paid sick leave in each calendar year; and (c) For employers with one hundred or more employees in any calendar year each employee shall be provided with up to fifty-six hours of paid sick leave each calendar year. )
